default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Stich. 5, 3, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">plura scripsissem, nisi tui festinarent,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:12:22:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 12, 22, 4</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:6:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Att. 6, 2 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">solent nautae festinare quaestus sui causa,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:16:9:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Fam. 16, 9, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">esseda festinant, pilenta, petorrita, naves,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 2, 1, 192</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in provinciam festinare,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:6:3:39" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 6, 3, 39</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad portas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 69:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 69, 2</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">ad singulare Antonii factum festinat oratio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,035:1:1:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Phil. 1, 1, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad probationem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:4:3:8" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 4, 3, 8</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:4:5:10" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 4, 5, 10</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">quis te festinare jubet?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1276,001:14:212" default="NO"><author>Juv.</author> 14, 212</bibl></cit>.—Prov.: festina lente (<foreign lang="greek">speu=de brade/ws</foreign>), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:25" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 25</bibl>.</sense><sense id="n18034.2" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Transf.</usg>, as <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to make haste with</hi> a thing, <hi rend="ital">to hasten</hi>, <hi rend="ital">hurry</hi>, <hi rend="ital">accelerate</hi>, <hi rend="ital">do speedily.</hi> </sense><sense id="n18034.3" n="(a)" level="5"> With an <hi rend="ital">object-clause</hi> (class.): <cit><quote lang="la">ut migrare tanto opere festines,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:7:23" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 7, 23 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ne festinaret abire,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 64:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 64, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ultum ire injurias,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:ib. 68:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> ib. 68, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">finem imponere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:4:146" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 9, 4, 146</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sequi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:6:6:25" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 6, 6, 25</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">componere lites,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 1, 2, 12</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quae laedunt oculum, festinas demere,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 1, 2, 38</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">terris advertere proram,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:4:117" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 4, 117</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aram congerere arboribus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:6:177" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> A. 6, 177</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">callidus id modo festinabat, Bocchi pacem imminuere, ne, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 81" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 81 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">universis prodesse festinet,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Inscr. Orell.</author> 775</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n18034.4" n="(b)" level="5"> With <case>acc.</case> (not in Cic.): festivum festinant diem, <hi rend="ital">hasten to celebrate</hi>, Enn. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Serv.</author> Verg. A. 9, 401</bibl> (Trag. v. 434 ed. Vahl.): <cit><quote lang="la">ni id festinaret,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 77:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 77, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad bellum cuncta,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:ib. 73:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> ib. 73, 1</bibl></cit>: soleas festinate (sc. dare), id. Fragm. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Serv.</author> Verg. A. 12, 425</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">festinare fugam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:4:575" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 4, 575</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">vias,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,001:2:478" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> Th. 2, 478</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">poenas,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 1, 2, 61</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pyram,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1345,001:8:52" default="NO"><author>Sil.</author> 8, 52</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">vestes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,002:2:1:128" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> S. 2, 1, 128</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">caedes, patibula, ignes, cruces,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:14:33" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 14, 33</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">mortem in se,</quote> <trans><tr>to bring on speedily</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 4, 28</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pyram,</quote> <trans><tr>prepares in haste</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1345,001:8:52" default="NO"><author>Sil.</author> 8, 52</bibl></cit>.—In <hi rend="ital">pass.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">quod animo cupienti nihil satis festinatur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 64" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> J. 64 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ea cuncta per idoneos ministros festinabantur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:2:82" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 2, 82</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cum belli civilis praemia festinarentur,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 3, 37</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nec virgines festinantur,</quote> <trans><tr>are not married early</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,002:20" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> G. 20</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">adoptio festinatur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:12:25" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> A. 12, 25</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">6, 50</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:3:37" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> H. 3, 37</bibl>.—In <hi rend="ital">part. perf.</hi>, <hi rend="ital">hastened</hi>, <hi rend="ital">accelerated</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">festinata maturitas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:6 praef" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 6 praef.</bibl></cit> § 10; <cit><quote lang="la">iter,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,009:4:5:8" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> P. 4, 5, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">missio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:1:52" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 1, 52</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">casus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 6, 44</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nuptiae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:69" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 69</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">honores,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>obtained before the proper time</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:8:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 8, 24</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,002:69:5" default="NO"><author>Plin.</author> Pan. 69, 5</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">festinatis annis raptus,</quote> <trans><tr>by an early death</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1294,001:7:40:7" default="NO"><author>Mart.</author> 7, 40, 7</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">festinatis lictorum manibus in carcerem raptus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:6:40" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 6, 40</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">mors domini gladiis tam festinata,</quote> <trans><tr>prematurely inflicted</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1276,001:4:96" default="NO"><author>Juv.</author> 4, 96</bibl></cit>.—* </sense><sense id="n18034.5" n="(g)" level="5"> With <hi rend="ital">se</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to make haste</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:14:2:9" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 14, 2, 9</bibl>.—Hence, </sense><sense id="n18034.6" n="1" level="3"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">festīnans</orth>, <itype>antis</itype>, <pos>P. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">hasty</hi>, <hi rend="ital">in haste</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ille properans, festinans, mandata vestra conficere cupiens,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,035:9:3:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Phil. 9, 3, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">haec festinans scripsi in itinere atque agmine,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:6:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Att. 6, 4</bibl></cit> <hi rend="ital">fin. —Adv.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">festīnanter</orth>, <hi rend="ital">hastily</hi>, <hi rend="ital">speedily</hi>, <hi rend="ital">quickly</hi> (class.): <cit><quote lang="la">improbe, turbide, festinanter, rapide omnia videtis esse suscepta, Cic. Scaur. § 37: nimium festinanter dictum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,048:5:26:77" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Fin. 5, 26, 77</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">compositius cuncta quam festinantius agerent,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:15:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 15, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">factum quid,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:10:11:8" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 10, 11, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">publicatum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:29" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 29</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">germinant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:17:78" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 17, 11, 15, § 78</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Sup.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">festinantissime,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2468,001:Ep. 250" default="NO"><author>Aug.</author> Ep. 250</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n18034.7" n="2" level="3"> <orth extent="full" lang="la">festīnāto</orth>, <pos>adv.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">hastily</hi>, <hi rend="ital">hurriedly</hi> (post-Aug.): <cit><quote lang="la">quam nihil praeparato, nihil festinato fecisse videtur Milo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:4:2:58" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 4, 2, 58</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cl.:16" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Claud. 16</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,001:44:11 al" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Gen. 44, 11 al.</bibl></sense></entryFree>
